mapper.select: SELECT C.USER_ID, C.PRODUCT_ID, P.PRODUCT_NAME, C.PRICE, C.QUANTITY FROM PRODUCT P, CART C WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = C.PRODUCT_ID AND C.USER_ID = #{customerID}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO CART(USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRICE, QUANTITY) VALUES(#{customerId}, #{PRODUCT_ID}, #{price}, #{PRICE}, #{quantity})
